title: Acas early conciliation certificate
p1: You should check the Acas certificate number and date, or whether the claimant was correct to say they were exempt from early conciliation.
link: View Acas certificate (opens in new tab)

doYouDisagreeAboutAcas.label: Do you disagree with any details given by the claimant about early conciliation with Acas?

whyDoYouDisagreeAcas.label: Why do you disagree with the Acas conciliation details given? (optional)

whyDoYouDisagreeAcas.tooLong: The details of why you disagree must be less than 2500 characters
